lines: 1. Weche mag mirima mondoKik pusre a e dhowa;Paro maber mond` ogeng`giKa pok giwuok e dhowa.
"Heroreuru," Ruodhwa owacho;Nyithindo winjuru chik mar Wuoro;(Heroreuru, herreuru,Winjuru chik mar Wuoro;),"Heroreuru," Ruodhwa owacho;Nyithindo, winjuru chikne,(Herreuru, herreuru,Winjuru chikne.)
2. Wach marach jawuok mapiyo,To gin gik maduwo chuny;Gi maketho osiep kindwa,To weche mag mirima.
3. Hera ler kendo olong`o,Kik wayie ketho osiep;Nikech wach marach mwapuso;Ber mondo warit dhowa.
